question: Which steel firm has won the Prime Minister's trophy for 'Best Performing Integrated Steel Plant' in 2015-16?
explanation: Tata Steel Ltd (TISCO) has won the Prime Minister's trophy for 'Best Performing Integrated Steel Plant' in India during 2014-2015 and 2015- 16. This makes it the third consecutive-year for the firm to be honoured with this coveted award. Tata Steel has been recognised as the best integrated steel plant for 12 times and has won the PM's Trophy 10 times.
